cannabis has lots of medical purposses if used correctly.We need to stop under 18s smoking this drug but the only way we can do that is by legalising cannabis since 2008 when marijuana was reclasified as a class b drug the number of teens in prison risen dramatically,legalising cannabis is a must it will creat more jobs wich is something we really need in the uk.to make cannabis against the law is like saying god made a mistake legalise cannabis and tax it like liqour.how many people have died from cannabis?0
. i know alot of people are worried about there childrens taking cannabis... do you think keeping the marijuana illegal is going to stop them taking it?NO there isnt no age restrictions when buying cannabis from a drug dealers.keep the drug dealers of the street and legalise the herb!
